Text: Re Answer in Opposition Cc PacifiCorps proposed revisions to the draft answer Per A Ramfjord Stoel Rives LLP Kimberly Curry PM All Attached is a draft of our Answer in Opposition to the PXs February Request for Clarification on in the Alternative Request for Rehearing of FERCs Feb Order Rejecting its proposal to relax its creditworthiness requirements If you have any comments or revisions please let me know as soon as possible You may contact me by return email or by phone at Kim Stoel Rives Revisions Answerwpd
